edge: The Teen Choice Awards recognized the performances of the actresses in this film, with Reese Witherspoon receiving two nominations and Sofía Vergara also being nominated.
Reese Witherspoon received four nominations at the Teen Choice Awards for her performances in this film, including two for Best Comedy Actress and one for Best Hissy Fit.
Sofía Vergara also received nominations at the Teen Choice Awards for her performance in this film, including one for Best Chemistry with Reese Witherspoon and one for Best Liplock.
